resources.string: Overriding First Day Of The Week

It seems this is the first time you open this app. You can choose between one of the two following options for your first install (not choosing will have the same effect as choosing "Fresh Start").\n\n
(If you have already used this app in the past) Start with a completely empty app so that you can directly add all and only your ingredients, recipes and meals.\n\n
(Suggested) Create a basic template that can be manually modified or deleted later. This way you\'ll have a rough idea of what the app should look like and how each functionality works.
Do you really want to delete this recipe collection? All the relative data will be lost.

You\'re about to change the first day of your weekly plans. If you have some already saved weeks, the app will have to refactor that data and "shift" it so that they start with the new first day of the week. By doing so, some garbage-filler data (empty meals) will be created and some data might be lost (you\'ll be informed about what (if any) specific data will be lost before proceeding and you\'ll be asked again to confirm later on) \n\nDo you want to proceed?
Refactoring… Do not close this app.

It looks like there are some pairs of consecutive weeks where the first week has a Day Format (Daily Meals) different to the second week's. This makes it unable for the app to refactor those two weeks and will end up in losing data relative to half of one of those two weeks. Do you want to change the first day of the week and refactor anyway?
